channel.title: maven on Devflection
channel.description: Recent content in maven on Devflection

item.title: Apache Maven Part 1 - Introduction and basics
item.author: matija@devflection.com (Matija Heričko)
item.description: This multi-post series will be looking at Apache Maven. In this first part, we will provide a high-level overview, explain some of the basics and show an example of a simple Maven managed project.
